repeat.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to say or write something again
repeat.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
Nick patiently repeated that he had to work that day.
Elderly people tend to repeat themselves.
repeat.translation[0].definitions[1].not: repeat a class/grade/year (=do the same class at school again the following year)
repeat.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Repeat the exercises twice a day.
We must not repeat the mistakes of the past.
The team are hoping to repeat their success (=achieve the same good result) of last season.
repeat.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to say something that someone else has just said, especially in order to learn it
repeat.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Repeat after me: amo, amas, amat ...
repeat.translation[0].definitions[3].def: to tell someone something that you have heard, especially something secret
repeat.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: Here’s what happened, but don’t repeat it.
repeat.translation[0].definitions[4].def: to broadcast a television or radio programme again
repeat.translation[0].definitions[4].exa: The series will be repeated in the autumn.
repeat.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an event that is very like something that happened before
repeat.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: It was a terrible journey – I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (=have the same thing happen again) on the way home.
The match was basically a repeat of last year’s game at Wembley.
repeat.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a television or radio programme that has been broadcast before
repeat.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: ‘Is it a repeat?’ ‘No, it’s a new series.’
repeat.translation[1].definitions[2].def: the sign that tells a performer to play a piece of music again, or the music that is played again
repeat.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to achieve the same results, level of performance etc
repeat.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: It was the best-selling car last year and may well repeat that success this year.
repeat.translation[3].definitions[0].def: an event, situation etc that is very similar to one that has happened before
repeat.translation[3].definitions[0].exa: I don’t think this year will see a repeat of last year’s earnings.
